proxylist.name: proxy-list
proxylist.description: This method will return a list of Infrared's proxies

bot.name: bot
bot.description: This command manages the bot permissions

add.name: add
add.description: This command will add a new user to the bot permissions list

remove.name: remove
remove.description: This command will remove the user from the bot permissions list

serverinfo.name: server-info
serverinfo.description: This method will return an embed with the description of the given server IP address
serverinfo.ip: IP of the server you want the information

error.command_error_reply: There was an error while trying to execute this command
error.API_error: There was an error with the API
error.DB_error: There was an error with the database
error.reaction_error: You can not react to this message
error.noPermission: You don't have permission to execute this command
error.no_user: The user does not exists in the database

add.title: User added
add.description: This user has now permission to use the bot

remove.title: User removed
remove.description: This user was removed from the bot permissions list
